#summary Open Cinema Tools Wiki Index

= Introduction =

The goals for Open Cinema Tools are:

    * creation of DCP from source files
    * support for multi-reel DCPs with several audio and subtitle tracks
    * development of an intuitive, multi-lingual user interface 

See www.opencinematools.org for executive details.

= Release Notes =
== Release 1.0.0 ==
This is the first release. This version includes 3 command line tools:
  * [MkCpl mkcpl]
  * [MkPkl mkpkl]
  * [MkMap mkmap]
There is currently no GUI. Subtitles are not supported.

[http://code.google.com/p/opencinematools/downloads/list Download]
